sections.title: Familiar Basics and Selection Table
sections.description: Core rules for familiars including what they are, how to obtain and replace them, and the complete table of familiar options with their special abilities

sections.title: Familiar Mechanics and Advancement
sections.description: Detailed mechanics for how familiars work including hit points, attacks, saves, skills, and level-based advancement table with special abilities

sections.title: Familiar Special Abilities
sections.description: Detailed descriptions of all special abilities familiars gain as they advance, including alertness, improved evasion, share spells, empathic link, deliver touch spells, and communication abilities

sections.title: Small and Vermin Familiars
sections.description: Special rules for small-sized familiars and how vermin gain intelligence when becoming familiars

sections.title: Approximating Familiars (Simple Method)
sections.description: Guidelines for creating custom familiars by re-skinning existing stat blocks to represent different creatures

sections.title: Advanced Familiar Customization Methods
sections.description: Simple and advanced methods for creating custom familiars, including guidelines for modifying skills, feats, attacks, and speeds while maintaining balance

sections.title: Controlling Companions and Familiars
sections.description: Rules for who controls various types of companions including familiars, covering aspects of control, game balance, and information sharing between characters and companions

sections.title: Advancing Companions
sections.description: Guidelines for how companions advance and gain levels, including who makes advancement choices for animal companions, cohorts, eidolons, and other companion types

sections.title: Intelligent Animals
sections.description: Rules for animals with Intelligence 3+ including language learning, tool use, communication limitations, and the awaken spell's effects

sections.title: Companion Plot Hooks
sections.description: Story and roleplaying opportunities created by companions, with specific plot hook ideas for animal companions, cohorts, eidolons, familiars, and followers

sections.title: Reviving and Replacing Companions
sections.description: Rules for bringing back dead companions through resurrection magic and finding replacement companions when the original is lost or dies

sections.title: Bloodline Familiars
sections.description: Special familiar abilities based on sorcerer bloodlines, including specific abilities for aberrant, abyssal, arcane, celestial, destined, draconic, elemental, fey, infernal, and undead bloodlines

sections.title: Patron Familiars
sections.description: Special familiar abilities tied to witch patrons, including abilities for agility, animals, deception, elements, endurance, plague, shadow, strength, transformation, trickery, water, and wisdom patrons
